title: Nihal6443
author: Nihal6443
content: For me AVAX (avalanche) Is the coin i got good profit in this coin by investing 5 times. First two times i got huge profits. But after that not huge but that was also the good profit by holding same coin.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Raiblock (XRB) A.K.A NANO.From this alt-coin, I finally know more about Cryptocurrency. It's super easy and free for mining this coin on the olds day, you just need to solved captcha for the coin. Finally this coin making the big success by listing on Binance.It's crazy.

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Quote from: Nihal6443 on December 02, 2022, 05:31:15 AMFor me AVAX (avalanche) Is the coin i got good profit in this coin by investing 5 times. First two times i got huge profits. But after that not huge but that was also the good profit by holding same coin. Almost every shitcoin is capable of giving you returns as long as you invest on them earlier and cash out when they are at peak. What most people do is they are entering after the big whales accumulated so when they dump the investors will be in loss. I don't really trust any project because its already existing and we are in bearish days so there is uncertain situation for the shitcoins to pass along these days.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: I think ggcoin which I earned from bounty the biggest one I earned but for trading. Yes avax is also one of my huge profit as it gives me 100x since Ive invested on their public ICO last 2019. Also ftm and spirit tokens too. There are others too like shitcoins but not comparable to this projects.Hoping for some new ICOs to invest with while the market isnt booming again.

comments.author: Wahyuihib
comments.body: I am also happy to hear the news if you benefit from the trades you make.  But don't be too brave to risk all the capital you have.  Because we also don't know what will happen to cryptocurrency trading in the future

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on December 02, 2022, 08:46:11 AMRaiblock (XRB) A.K.A NANO.From this alt-coin, I finally know more about Cryptocurrency. It's super easy and free for mining this coin on the olds day, you just need to solved captcha for the coin. Finally this coin making the big success by listing on Binance.It's crazy.There was many faucets for Nano few years ago, it was so damn cheap and that time Doge coin was very cheap too, this should serve as a lesson that coins that easily gets to people just because they are cheap leads to good adoption and one day such Coins will have value.  Fantom brings me a very good profits, I've noticed that the coins that brings the best ROI are those that people aren't talking too much about.

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Quote from: Nihal6443 on December 02, 2022, 05:31:15 AMFor me AVAX (avalanche) Is the coin i got good profit in this coin by investing 5 times. First two times i got huge profits. But after that not huge but that was also the good profit by holding same coin. It was believed that investing in hype projects will give you an amazing profit for a short-term condition which is different from investing in ETH and BNB as they could give you more and not only just a profit but also investment security. However, in the situation today, x5 is somewhat lucky for you OP. Because it was hard to see which project will give you that, not this bear season, maybe during the bull market. If we are looking at them this time, I will tell you that you just fail. It was not the perfect time to see this kind of market sentiment.

comments.author: sulendra12
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on December 02, 2022, 08:46:11 AMRaiblock (XRB) A.K.A NANO.From this alt-coin, I finally know more about Cryptocurrency. It's super easy and free for mining this coin on the olds day, you just need to solved captcha for the coin. Finally this coin making the big success by listing on Binance.It's crazy.I remember this coin a.k.a mRai if you are familiar with itIn early 2016-2017 where everyone make a commission-based payback for every captcha you successfully solve, so many people joined this from just regular captcha solvers to big team to solve the captchas. It was really nice experience to be part with it especially with the amount of you'd get that day which is really high compared to any bounty you find here today in total.Quote from: Nihal6443 on December 02, 2022, 05:31:15 AMFor me AVAX (avalanche) Is the coin i got good profit in this coin by investing 5 times. First two times i got huge profits. But after that not huge but that was also the good profit by holding same coin. Made huge profit from MONACO and of course the website is already downFirst launched in 2017 where the ICO of MONACO was a huge success and you could literally make 10 - 30X of your ICO investment when listed on exchanges, it was on Poloniex as far as I remember. Pretty good year I would say for ICO compared to todays standard

comments.author: len01
comments.body: I used to get an altcoin called ETHLend and I only held it for a while and apparently that made me very lucky.it turns out that ETHLend made a swap to AAVE coin and the price was fantastic when it was bullish last year.I had no idea that altcoins could be that expensive back then. whereas in the past I only thought that the coin would be a shitcoin but it turns out that ETHLend has been very good until now

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: It was hell of a ride with Ethereum from my own experience. I've held it through 2017 and then never sold during that time and then 2018 has came, I was urged to give up on it when it's just two digits in price but didn't do anything and kept the faith and held it until I've sold a lot of it last year. It was a great experience, I still hold a few of it and all I can say that was really hell of an experience because it's one of the cryptos that I've invested a lot not just with money but also with my feelings.

comments.author: so98nn
comments.body: For me it’s REMI coin, however sadly the project got doomed and they closed their doors after 2-3 years of journey. It was not scam neither team ran away from the investors. But with the time there was financial issues with the project and they had to close it down way early than what roadmap stated. I made whooping profits from it. It was easy to trade with low value. The only thing that kept me going on with this coin is, direct owner contacts through various social accounts. They were prompt and energetic. I think that was keeping the project on track and investors interested. Miss it.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: IDEAlogy (IDEA) token was a very cool investment which I made much thousand from it, how I wish most of my investment would went through that way I would have been more happier, although ethereum was as well pretty nice to me then but I sold out of panicking without knowing it could get this higher than before. 2017/18 dip made me to sell out of fear thinking it was the end of all crypto because it's unbearable to me seeing my assets losing 95 percent of what was initially invested.I learnt my lesson from then.

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: I got lots of coins that gave multiple profits since a few years ago started fromPnetwork, MANA, Sandbox, PYR, Solana and many more. I have been always spending a few hundreds dollars to invest in any of them. I didn't need to put lots of money into the same basket caused by it's quite risky for me. I was also making bunch of money from sonm which was buying around 12 cents. it was pumped so hard until reached new ATH which was around $12. The power of crypto that can give you instant money when you were investing in the right token. As long as there would be the hype and it can be pumped so hard.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Maybe it's not a many times profit but a big one-time profit because you can buy the right altcoin. I benefit from YFI, LPT, UNI, XTZ and many others. The average altcoin can increase very much from the purchase price at the project's initial launch or increase very much after its release on the market. Dogecoin is also one of the many altcoins that gave huge profits at that time.And I think it will happen again as soon as market conditions improve and it can increase again. This time, there will be more altcoins that might increase high and we have to analyze altcoins that have the opportunity to increase.

comments.author: Heulahee
comments.body: SNM gives me a huge profit again and again whenever I make a trade in it, whether it is long-term trade or it is short-term trade, but I can confess that. Being a trader, there are many opportunities for getting into a track, but a little risky it is. So I'm so lucky when I got a huge profit for over 7-10 times from SNM

comments.author: teosanru
comments.created_time: December 02, 2022, 08:06:26 PMLast edit: December 04, 2022, 08:08:22 PM by teosanru
comments.body: Quote from: Nihal6443 on December 02, 2022, 05:31:15 AMFor me AVAX (avalanche) Is the coin i got good profit in this coin by investing 5 times. First two times i got huge profits. But after that not huge but that was also the good profit by holding same coin. Kcs is one of them. it's quite ironic but it's the one which has actually given me profit in the bull run. I remember it rallied from around 3$ to around 20$ during the bull run almost making my money to 10x and i also remember that then I used to trade this very coin only for next 6 months because it became my favourite but eventually the volumes on this coin dried up so I stopped to trade on this altogether.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: Findingnemo on December 02, 2022, 10:52:26 AMQuote from: Nihal6443 on December 02, 2022, 05:31:15 AMFor me AVAX (avalanche) Is the coin i got good profit in this coin by investing 5 times. First two times i got huge profits. But after that not huge but that was also the good profit by holding same coin. Almost every shitcoin is capable of giving you returns as long as you invest on them earlier and cash out when they are at peak. What most people do is they are entering after the big whales accumulated so when they dump the investors will be in loss. I don't really trust any project because its already existing and we are in bearish days so there is uncertain situation for the shitcoins to pass along these days.Every coin has a tendency to give such high profit but tendencies won't mean being certain of something. Altcoins are known for high rate of increase in terms of their market value which gives huge returns to i vestors. Problem is, their market value is too volatile which adds risk from investing to such tokens. Usually, tokens which are not yet released, having or creating noise in this industry are the best ones to invest if you are into alts. But as I've said that won't guarantee things.I'd sugget lowering investor's assumption of profit. Diversification could have a bigger tendency to lessen the risk than to go all in with one token alone given that no clear patterns would be seen in the market.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: You only get multiple profits if you are lucky to invest in a coin in their pre-sales or early sales and you hold it until it reaches the point where it became successful throughout the years and its price has been increasing since. Sometimes when you have invested in the right way when the price of certain coins is still low, and you hit the jackpot by putting some decent money in it and the price will spike and you sold it before the price went down again.

comments.author: Ziskinberg
comments.body: I have no clue yet which coins can give us like that but for sure there is. I was also preparing some funds to invest in new projects, I'll take the risk. But this will be just spent during halving because as I have experienced in the past, most new projects unexpectedly soared high compared to old coins and I was going to believe that it will happen again. But as I've said, the risk is too high, and no assurance for it.I don't encourage people to do this but I think it was their time also to experience and be aware of the situation.

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on December 02, 2022, 08:46:11 AMRaiblock (XRB) A.K.A NANO.From this alt-coin, I finally know more about Cryptocurrency. It's super easy and free for mining this coin on the olds day, you just need to solved captcha for the coin. Finally this coin making the big success by listing on Binance.It's crazy.That coin is crazy in early of 2018 when it was Raidblock. $28 for that shit token that was rewarded by solving captcha in 2017.In the 2021 bull run, it recovered to over $10 but now again it is traded under $1. The token is crazy as it has changed the name two times from Raidblock to NANO, the token ticker changed three times from XRB to NANO and now XNO.https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/nano/
